name: VR Doctor Training Simulator: LMA Insertion
name_original: VR Doctor Training Simulator: LMA Insertion
description:
This VR prototype aims to teach doctors and paramedics how to insert an Laryngel Mask Airway.

A project created for Dr. Zachery Tan in Kilkenny hosptial by a team of 6 3rd year game design students in Technological University Dublin.

Compatible with Oculus, made specifically for Oculus Quest
